tool_description: Introducing a powerful Twitter API with 14 endpoints to help you access valuable Twitter data. With our API, you can easily retrieve user followers and followings, post likes, comments, quoted tweets, and retweets. You can also search for top, latest, videos, photos, and people, and access user tweets, replies, media, likes, and info by username or ID. Additionally, our autocomplete function helps you complete typed values with ease.

api_list.name: Get Users By IDs
api_list.description: Retrieve user information based on their IDs.

required_parameters.name: users
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs.

api_list.name: Get User Likes
api_list.description: Get the likes of a user by their ID.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of likes to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: User ID to fetch likes for.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

api_list.name: Get User Media
api_list.description: Retrieve media posted by a user by their ID.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of media items to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: User ID to fetch media for.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

api_list.name: Get User Replies
api_list.description: Get replies made by a user by their ID.

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: User ID to fetch replies for.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of replies to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

api_list.name: Get User Tweets
api_list.description: Retrieve tweets made by a user by their ID.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of tweets to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: User ID to fetch tweets for.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: The input value to autocomplete.

api_list.name: Search Twitter
api_list.description: Search Twitter for top, latest, videos, photos, and people.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of search results to return.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of results to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query string.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

required_parameters.name: count

required_parameters.name: pid
required_parameters.description: Post ID to fetch retweets for.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.

api_list.description: Get comments on a post by its ID.

required_parameters.description: Post ID to fetch comments for.

optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching more results.
